price: 56 Il dit : « Qui peut désespérer de la miséricorde de son Seigneur sinon un égaré ? »
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
